5.1 The browser

5.1.2 Compiler databases and the browser

The browser gets some of its information from the compiler database for the project. See "Compiler databases" on page 50 and "Source, database, and run-time views" on page 56 for details of how compiler databases are derived, and how they fit in to the overall view of a project that Functional Developer presents.
